verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:32
verses.text: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:33
verses.text: And the sons of Japhlet; Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These are the children of Japhlet.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:34
verses.text: And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:35
verses.text: And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:36
verses.text: The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:37
verses.text: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:38
verses.text: And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:39
verses.text: And the sons of Ulla; Arah, and Haniel, and Rezia.
